verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H7919>considers<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> him in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H8104>preserve<s%> <S%H2421>him<s%>, and keep him alive; and he shall be <S%H833>blessed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and you will not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> him upon the <S%H6210>bed<s%> of <S%H1741>languishing<s%>: you will <S%H2015>make<s%> all his <S%H4904>bed<s%> in his <S%H2483>sickness<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H7495>me<s%>: heal my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; for I have sinned against <S%H2398>you<s%>.
My <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> of <S%H4191>me<s%>, When shall he die, and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>?

And if he <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1696>me<s%>, he speaks <S%H7723>vanity<s%>: his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6908>gathers<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> to <S%H3318>itself<s%>; when he goes <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, he tells <S%H1696>it<s%>.
All that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H3907>whisper<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> against <S%H2803>me<s%>: against me do they devise my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
A <S%H1100>evil<s%> <S%H1697>disease<s%>, say <S%H3332>they<s%>, cleaves fast unto <S%H7901>him<s%>: and now that he lies he shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%>.
<S%H7965>Yes<s%>, my own familiar <S%H376>friend<s%>, in whom I <S%H982>trusted<s%>, which did <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread<s%>, has lifted <S%H1431>up<s%> his heel against <S%H6119>me<s%>.
But <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H6965>me<s%>, and raise me up, that I may requite <S%H7999>them<s%>.
By this I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H2654>favor<s%> <S%H341>me<s%>, because my enemy does not triumph over <S%H7321>me<s%>.
And as for <S%H8551>me<s%>, you uphold me in my <S%H8537>integrity<s%>, and <S%H5324>set<s%> me before your <S%H6440>face<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>, and to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>. <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
